name: Legendary Boss Slayer
dialogs: The realm's greatest threats await. Do you have the courage to face them?
Every boss has a weakness. Learn to find it, and victory will be yours.
Excellent! Your first boss falls. This is only the beginning.
You've proven yourself against legendary foes. Few can match your skill.
The Ultimate Boss threatens all existence. Only you can stop it now.
Champion! Your name will be remembered as the greatest Boss Slayer of all time!
